# networkRule

**Instance Property**

The network rule that defines the network traffic characteristics that this filter rule matches.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var networkRule: NENetworkRule { get }
```

## Inspecting Filter Rule Properties

- **action**: The action to take when this rule matches network traffic.

items.description: The action to take when this rule matches network traffic.
